Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/wget/wget-1.21.4.tar.gz
ğŸš echo 81542f5cefb8faacc39bbbc6c82ded80e3e4a88505ae72ea51df27525bcde04c  wget-1.21.4.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf wget-1.21.4.tar.gz
ğŸš cd wget-1.21.4
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/wget-1.21.4
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš sudo find /opt/package/wget-1.21.4/etc -type f -exec mv {} {}.new ;
ğŸš rm -rf
